description: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and passion for development

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: This very portfolio you're looking at!

projects.title: Accelerating Matrix Computation on GPU
projects.description: Optimized CUDA matrix multiplication to achieve cuBLAS-level performance. Used coalesced memory access and 2D shared-memory tiling for data reuse. Applied register-based blocking to boost parallelism and cut shared memory traffic.

projects.title: SportTalk - Live Sports Chat
projects.description: Web chat application for live sports matches with dynamic chat rooms. Fans can join, access live scores, and support their teams. Also includes private chat rooms for those who can't handle the public drama!

projects.title: Custom Programming Language
projects.description: Constructed a programming language using low-level programming tools incorporating user-friendly keywords, operators, control structures, recursive functions, and support for classes and objects.

projects.title: Vulnerabilities and Attacks
projects.description: Exploited vulnerable C code with stack-smashing, buffer overflows, and DEP bypass. Tested websites for SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF vulnerabilities. Conducted attacks including dictionary, oracle padding, and length extension.

projects.title: SaS - Share & Save News
projects.description: A mobile application where users can save, listen to, and share news articles with friends. Designed UI pages with various views, modals, pressable elements using React Native and JavaScript. Backend functionalities is designed using NodeJS, with MongoDB for handling data management.
